name: Viewfinder
description:
Viewfinder is a game developed by Robot Turtle where you can reshape the world around you by taking photos with an instant camera.

It’s a first person adventure game where you can bring pictures to life, incorporating them into the environment. You can find photos, paintings, drawings and other images around the game world, or create them yourself using the camera.

The game is set within a virtual environment inspired by brutalism, solarpunk and retrofuturism, creating surreal and dreamlike landscapes.
